none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 15, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
Fuck it. Shameless Canadian appreciation continues in the form of frantic apocalypse DBeat from Ontario. Shaped in the DOOM mold with MASSKONTROLL delivery - throaty, guttural vocals and swarms of buzzsaw guitars - UNFAIR skip all of the bullshit and get straight to the point. Banging is mandatory.  HOLY WEAPON OF PEACE 
https://unfairpunk.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Unfair - Holy Weapon Of Peace - Terminal Escape
